original_title: Townes Van Zandt: Live in Amsterdam
overview: Recorded in Amsterdam at De Melk Weg (The Milky Way) on 11/2/91. Townes was touring Europe with his family, 9 year old will and his pregnant wife Jeanene. He was in good shape and working on a year of sobriety. This is the only film footage of an entire Townes concert known to exist.
title: Townes Van Zandt: Live in Amsterdam
